title: Ransomware attacks now target unpatched WS_FTP servers
description: Internet-exposed WS_FTP servers unpatched against a maximum severity vulnerability are now targeted in ransomware attacks.  [...]

title: Malicious Solana, Kucoin packages infect NuGet devs with SeroXen RAT
description: Malicious NuGet packages appearing to have over 2 million downloads impersonate crypto wallets, crypto exchange, and Discord libraries to infect developers with the SeroXen remote access trojan. [...]

title: New Microsoft bug bounty program focuses on AI-powered Bing
description: Microsoft announced a new AI bounty program focused on the AI-driven Bing experience, with rewards reaching $15,000. [...]

title: Apple fixes iOS Kernel zero-day vulnerability on older iPhones
description: Apple has published security updates for older iPhones and iPads to backport patches released one week ago, addressing two zero-day vulnerabilities exploited in attacks. [...]

title: ToddyCat hackers use 'disposable' malware to target Asian telecoms
description: A newly discovered campaign dubbed "Stayin' Alive" has been targeting government organizations and telecommunication service providers across Asia since 2021, using a wide variety of "disposable" malware to evade detection. [...]

title: Hyped up curl vulnerability falls short of expectations
description: curl 8.4.0 has been released to patch and release details on a hyped up high-severity security vulnerability (CVE-2023-38546), easing week-long concerns regarding the flaw's severity. [...]

title: Shadow PC warns of data breach as hacker tries to sell gamers' info
description: Shadow PC, a provider of high-end cloud computing services, is warning customers of a data breach that exposed customers' private information, as a threat actor claims to be selling the stolen data for over 500,000 customers. [...]
